title: NARAVNA KREMA ZA ROKE S HIALURONOM, GAIA NATURELLE, 100ML

instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Kremo za roke nanesite na čiste roke enkrat ali večkrat na dan. Krema se hitro vpije in ne pušča mastnih madežev.

security-warning.varnostna-opozorila: Krema je namenjena samo za zunanjo uporabo. Izogibajte se stiku z očmi.

ingredient-information.sestavine: aqua. AQUA, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS SEED OIL, COCOS NUCIFERA OIL, MANGIFERA INDICA SEED BUTTER, GLYCERYL STEARATE CITRATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERIN, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER, ZEA MAYS STARCH, BEESWAX, DIMETHYL SULFONE, NIACINAMIDE, HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, PARFUM, SODIUM LEVULINATE, SODIUM ANISATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, TOCOPHEROL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL, CITRIC ACID, XANTHAN GUM, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE POWDER.

contact-information.kontakt:: Gaia Naturelle d.o.o., Jakčeva ulica 43, 1000 Ljubljana
